Package com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.service.transport.amqps

Class AmqpSendHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
      • com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.service.transport.amqps.AmqpSendHandler

  • public class AmqpSendHandler
extends org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
    Instance of the QPID-Proton-J BaseHandler class to override the events what are needed to handle the send operation Contains and sets connection parameters (path, port, endpoint) Maintains the layers of AMQP protocol (Link, Session, Connection, Transport) Creates and sets SASL authentication for transport

    • Constructor Detail

      • AmqpSendHandler

        public AmqpSendHandler​(java.lang.String hostName,
                       java.lang.String userName,
                       java.lang.String sasToken,
                       IotHubServiceClientProtocol iotHubServiceClientProtocol)
        Constructor to set up connection parameters and initialize handshaker for transport
        Parameters:
        hostName - The address string of the service (example: AAA.BBB.CCC)
        userName - The username string to use SASL authentication (example: user@sas.service)
        sasToken - The SAS token string
        iotHubServiceClientProtocol - protocol to use
